metadata.title: CVE-2022-24130 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: xterm through Patch 370, when Sixel support is enabled, allows attackers totrigger a buffer overflow in set_sixel in graphics_sixel.c via craftedtext.

criterions.comment: xterm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
